name: JAPP: Just Another Precise Platformer
description:
JAPP: Just Another Precise Platformer is a mouse based 2D precision platformer that is quite challenging.
But when you have the physics of the game in your fingers, it's a pure bliss.

Climb to the top the fastest possible way is your mission on this game!
You can (for now) play 2 characters, the Square & the Circle.
Both have their advantages and disadvantages, but you can climb to the top as fast with both.

I hope you will enjoy this as much as I enjoyed making this game.

Have fun :)
